thread.title: Ana ci gaba da boren kin jinin gwamnati a Romania - BBC Hausa
thread.title_full: Ana ci gaba da boren kin jinin gwamnati a Romania - BBC Hausa

title: Ana ci gaba da boren kin jinin gwamnati a Romania - BBC Hausa
text:
Ana ci gaba da boren kin jinin gwamnati a Romania 12 Fabrairu 2017 Game da aika wa Rufe wurin aika labari Image caption Wawure kudin al'uma da bai wuce dala 48,000 ba laifin da za a gurfanar da jimi'in gwamnati a Romania ba ne Masu zanga-zangar kin jinin gwamnati a Romania, sun cika dandalin Victory da ke babban birnin kasar Bucharest, a rana ta goma sha biyu da fara boren, inda suke bukatar kaf jami'an gwamnati na jam'iyyar Social Democrats su yi murabus. 
Wadanda suka shirya zanga-zangar dai, sun yi ta bin dubban masu boren da sukai fitowar da ba a taba ganin irinta ba, da kofin shayi da biredi. 
Masu boren dai na tsoron matukar sabon kudurin dokar da gwamnati, ta baiwa jami'ai damar wawure kudin jama'a matukar ba su wuce dala dubu arba'in da takwas ba, ka iya janyowa a sake yi wa wasu dokokin kasar garanbawul da hakan zai cutar da 'yan kasa. 
A nata bangaren, gwamnati ta ce ta na kokarin sake yi wa dokar kwaskwarima, amma masu boren sun ce gwamnati na kokarin halatta cin hanci da rashawa tsakanin jami'an ta.
